languages.text: ...Словно мертвый кит, выброшенный на берег неумолимой силой прибоя, разбитый корабль предстал глазам незваных гостей. В нескольких отсеках сохранилась атмосфера, но не жизнь. Корабль погиб, его машинные духи растворились во тьме космоса. Это воистину был только остов, и команде Вольного Торговца предстояло стать падальщиками, наводняющими тушу погибшего исполина.

...Like a dead whale cast ashore by the inexorable force of the swell, the wrecked vessel was a confronting sight for its unwitting visitors. Some bays still retained an atmosphere, but there was no life anywhere. The ship was dead, its machine spirits dissipated in the darkness of space. It was just the husk left, and the Rogue Trader's crew were to become scavengers swarming the carcass of a fallen leviathan.
languages.original_text: ...Словно мертвый кит, выброшенный на берег неумолимой силой прибоя, разбитый корабль предстал глазам незваных гостей. В нескольких отсеках сохранилась атмосфера, но не жизнь. Корабль погиб, его машинные духи растворились во тьме космоса. Это воистину был только остов, и команде Вольного Торговца предстояло стать падальщиками, наводняющими тушу погибшего исполина.

It was just the husk left, and the Rogue Trader's crew were to become scavengers swarming the carcass of a fallen leviathan.

...Like a dead whale cast ashore by the inexorable force of the swell, the wrecked vessel was a confronting sight for its unwitting visitors. Some bays still retained an atmosphere, but there was no life anywhere. The ship was dead, its machine spirits dissipated in the darkness of space. It was just the husk left, and the Rogue Trader's crew were to become scavengers swarming the carcass of a fallen leviathan.

languages.text: ... Como una ballena varada, estampada contra la costa por la marea, el navío averiado presentaba una tarea compleja para sus visitantes. Algunas bahías conservaban su atmósfera, pero no había vida en ninguna parte. La nave estaba muerta y sus espíritus máquina se habían disipado en las tinieblas del espacio. Solo quedaba un cascarón, el cadáver de un leviatán que la tripulación de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente debía registrar en busca de carroña.
languages.original_text: ...Like a dead whale cast ashore by the inexorable force of the swell, the wrecked vessel was a confronting sight for its unwitting visitors. Some bays still retained an atmosphere, but there was no life anywhere. The ship was dead, its machine spirits dissipated in the darkness of space. It was just the husk left, and the Rogue Trader's crew were to become scavengers swarming the carcass of a fallen leviathan.

traits.locale_text: ... Como una ballena varada, estampada contra la costa por la marea, el navío averiado presentaba una tarea compleja para sus visitantes. Algunas bahías conservaban su atmósfera, pero no había vida en ninguna parte. La nave estaba muerta y sus espíritus máquina se habían disipado en las tinieblas del espacio. Solo quedaba un cascarón, el cadáver de un leviatán que la tripulación de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente debía registrar en busca de carroña.

languages.text: ......那艘失事的飞船仿佛一条死鲸，被无情的海浪抛上了岸。所有不知情的访客都会为船上的景象震惊。部分船舱依然保持着工作的氛围，但船上已经不再有生命的迹象。这艘飞船已经死了，它的机魂已经消散于黑暗的太空之中，只有外壳残存。行商浪人的船员们蜂拥而至，来到这只已经死去的巨兽尸体之中，回收尚可回收的资源。
languages.original_text: ...Like a dead whale cast ashore by the inexorable force of the swell, the wrecked vessel was a confronting sight for its unwitting visitors. Some bays still retained an atmosphere, but there was no life anywhere. The ship was dead, its machine spirits dissipated in the darkness of space. It was just the husk left, and the Rogue Trader's crew were to become scavengers swarming the carcass of a fallen leviathan.

traits.locale_text: ......那艘失事的飞船仿佛一条死鲸，被无情的海浪抛上了岸。所有不知情的访客都会为船上的景象震惊。部分船舱依然保持着工作的氛围，但船上已经不再有生命的迹象。这艘飞船已经死了，它的机魂已经消散于黑暗的太空之中，只有外壳残存。行商浪人的船员们蜂拥而至，来到这只已经死去的巨兽尸体之中，回收尚可回收的资源。

languages.text: …容赦のないうねりの力で岸に打ち上げられたクジラの死体のように、難破船は、何も知らずに訪れた人には衝撃的な光景だった。ベイの中にはまだ空気が残っているものもあったが、どこにも生命体はいない。船は死んでいて、その機械精霊は宇宙の暗闇に消えていた。残ったのは船体だけで、自由開拓者のクルー達は、あたかも落ちた巨大海獣の死骸に群がるスカベンジャーのようだった。
languages.original_text: ...Like a dead whale cast ashore by the inexorable force of the swell, the wrecked vessel was a confronting sight for its unwitting visitors. Some bays still retained an atmosphere, but there was no life anywhere. The ship was dead, its machine spirits dissipated in the darkness of space. It was just the husk left, and the Rogue Trader's crew were to become scavengers swarming the carcass of a fallen leviathan.

languages.text: ... wie ein toter Wal, der durch die beeinflussbare Kraft der Brandung an den Strand gespült wird, war das Schiffswrack ein beunruhigender Anblick für seine ahnungslosen Besucher. Einige Buchten hatten noch Atmosphäre, aber es gab nirgendwo Anzeichen von Leben. Das Schiff war tot, seine Maschinengeister hatten sich in die Dunkelheit des Weltraums verflüchtigt. Nur der Rumpf war noch übrig, und die Crew {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} wurde zu Plünderern, die über den Kadaver eines gefallenen Leviathans herfielen.
languages.original_text: ...Like a dead whale cast ashore by the inexorable force of the swell, the wrecked vessel was a confronting sight for its unwitting visitors. Some bays still retained an atmosphere, but there was no life anywhere. The ship was dead, its machine spirits dissipated in the darkness of space. It was just the husk left, and the Rogue Trader's crew were to become scavengers swarming the carcass of a fallen leviathan.

languages.text: ... Tel le cadavre d'une baleine rejeté sur le rivage par la force inexorable de la marée, l'épave du vaisseau offrait un spectacle perturbant à ses découvreurs involontaires. Bien qu'une atmosphère subsistât dans certains compartiments, on ne décelait aucun signe de vie. Le vaisseau était mort, privé des esprits de ses machines qui s'étaient dissipés dans les ténèbres de l'espace, et les membres de l'équipage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} seraient les charognards se jetant avidement sur la carcasse d'un géant déchu.
languages.original_text: ...Like a dead whale cast ashore by the inexorable force of the swell, the wrecked vessel was a confronting sight for its unwitting visitors. Some bays still retained an atmosphere, but there was no life anywhere. The ship was dead, its machine spirits dissipated in the darkness of space. It was just the husk left, and the Rogue Trader's crew were to become scavengers swarming the carcass of a fallen leviathan.

languages.text: ...Enkaz hâlindeki gemi, bihaber ziyaretçilere amansız dalgaların gücüne karşı koyamayıp karaya vuran bir balina misali yaklaşıyordu. Bazı bölümlerde havanın ağırlığı hissedilse de herhangi bir hayat belirtisi yoktu. Gemi ölmüş, makine ruhları da uzayın karanlık boşluğunda yitip gitmişti. Geriye bomboş bir kabuk kalmıştı. Hür Tacir'in mürettebatıysa ölülerin üzerinde daireler çizen akbabalar misali bu canavarı yağmalamaya hazırlanıyordu.
languages.original_text: ...Like a dead whale cast ashore by the inexorable force of the swell, the wrecked vessel was a confronting sight for its unwitting visitors. Some bays still retained an atmosphere, but there was no life anywhere. The ship was dead, its machine spirits dissipated in the darkness of space. It was just the husk left, and the Rogue Trader's crew were to become scavengers swarming the carcass of a fallen leviathan.

traits.locale_text: …Enkaz hâlindeki gemi, bihaber ziyaretçilere amansız dalgaların gücüne karşı koyamayıp karaya vuran bir balina misali yaklaşıyordu. Bazı bölümlerde havanın ağırlığı hissediliyordu ancak herhangi bir hayat belirtisi yoktu. Gemi ölüydü, makine ruhları ise uzayın karanlık boşluğunda yitip gitmişti. Geriye kalan bomboş bir kabuktu. Hür Tacir'in mürettebatıysa ölülerin üzerinde daireler çizen akbabalar misali, bu canavarı yağmalamaya hazırlanıyordu.
